author: cbs8
title: Snapshots Of Life Rendered In New Poetry, Prose Collection
text:
B.D. Mullins’ ‘Life’s Rhymes for Our Times’ captures moments for readers to observe
ORIENT, Ohio (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
Author B.D. Mullins’ new collection of poetry and prose , “ Life’s Rhymes for Our Times ” (published by Trafford Publishing), offers readers the chance to view and observe the world as Mullins has seen it.
Each poem captures a moment or memory from Mullins’ life, recreating it for readers. He also includes a brief story of the event that inspired each poem and remembers the special people who played a role in the event.
Vivid and moving, “Life’s Rhymes for Our Times” explores a number of topics, including love, friendship , family and time. Mullins hopes readers will see the deeper meaning in his stories and poems and view their own worlds a little differently.
An excerpt from the poem “Isn’t Life Beautiful,” featured in “Life’s Rhymes for Our Times”:
“I crept upon the silence once
Only to watch it slip away
It came down to earth softly
And I looked upon this wonder”
“Life’s Rhymes for Our Times”
By B.D. Mullins
Hardcover | 6 x 9 in | 68 pages | ISBN 9781490754420
Softcover | 6 x 9 in | 68 pages | ISBN 9781490754437
E-Book | 68 pages | ISBN 9781490754413
Available at Amazon and Barnes & Noble
About the Author
B.D. Mullins is a writer, speaker, teacher, photographer, inventor, outdoorsman and philanthropist. He says his greatest gift is his ability to always be positive and to look at each day as a gift. He dedicates his life to helping others in their growth and understanding of life.
Trafford Publishing is an Author Solutions, LLC supported self-publishing services provider and was the first publisher in the world to offer an “on-demand publishing service” at its establishment in 1995. Trafford was also one of the earliest publishers to utilize the Internet for selling books. More than 10,000 authors from over 120 countries have utilized Trafford’s experience for self-publishing their books. For more information about Trafford Publishing, or to publish your book today, call 1-888-232-4444 or visit trafford.com.
